summary: Implemented a reusable HashtagsBlock component rendering the provided hashtags from a centralized config and wired it into the main app. Updated frontend/index.html SEO metadata by appending the hashtags to the meta description and adding a keywords meta tag.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced a centralized hashtags configuration module (single source of truth) beyond the explicit request to display/add metadata for hashtags.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only requires rendering specific hashtags in UI and adding them to HTML metadata; it does not require a new config layer.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/introduced project tracking artifacts (project_state.json entries and frontend-file-summaries.txt updates) unrelated to the hashtag UI/metadata requirements.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not ask for project state bookkeeping or summary files to be modified.
